alert.note: Alert for Logan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:55PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Logan County through 745 PM MDT... At 654 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Kimball Airport, or 7 miles south of Kimball, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westplains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
